channel.title: New Server~Need help~NPC setup~
channel.description:
[b]HELLO![/b]
[b]I have started a server but i need alot of help with setting up npcs and all that stuff! If anyone who has XP in this would like to A) Help me or B) Team up with me and creat a server with me that would be great! Post a reply a reply and ill get back to you as soon as possible! [/b] [size=50pt]ALL HELP IS WELCOM! [/size]
Anyone who assists me may have admin in the new server if they please!
[b]THANK YOU!!!!![/b]
